content.rendered:
GEOKC Annual Fund

GEOKC make full effort to obtain gifts on a yearly basis to support mostly general operations budget regularly and thankful to those donors who are willing to participate and want to be permanent donors or devotees of GEOKC.

GEOKC Annual Fund and the process to achieve the goal and mission of GEOKC is a part of donation or Seva and it is naturally build to follow to reach to the last step, while continue supporting the spiritual, religious, educational, social and cultural needs of GEOKC. This really helps the General Operation Budget and supports the devotional developmental programs of GEOKC to conduct into the multiple facilities locations including GEOKC Bhawan, Ashram Bhawan, and Temple.

It’s an organized effort by us and this is for the purpose of to secure gifts on an annual basis to support yearly budget, beside the other annual expenses. Funds are typically raised through mail or direct solicitation efforts to follow the annual giving process and also for acquiring the new participants.

Steps of Annual Fund:

The steps of GEOKC Annual Fund are as follows:

  • Annual Giving Campaign
  • GEOKC Midpoint Donors
  • Online Honor Roll Program for GEOKC Online Recognition
  • Annual Dinner Registration Flier (PDF)
  • Annual Dinner Registration Form 

Prior to making any of steps above, the first step of GEOKC Annual Fund is to donate as described below:

What is an GEOKC Annual Giving Donation?

The constant needs of GEOKC, program impact areas, and the spiritual, religious and educational needs of GEOKC is making an annual giving donation.

GEOKC Annual Giving is the best opportunity to support GEOKC and keep it active to benefit Hindu community with the opportunity to be a permanent part of GEOKC. Other community members can also get chance to join GEOKC or its activities with the same quantity of respect. All donors have equal chance to select any amount or inter by their own choice to give to GEOKC Annual Fund to help and support all causes of Annual Giving via receiving their full benefits.

GEOKC midpoint donors are those donors who are currently donating to our nonprofit and will get the opportunity for online recognition.
